sentence.text: Neurotrophins and their receptors might regulate cell survival in head and neck squamous cell carcinoma (HNnegative regulation of peptidase activity). mRNA expression of nerve growth factor (extrinsic apoptotic signaling pathway via death domain receptors) and protein synthesis of high (protein phosphorylation) and low affinity neurotrophin (p75 neurotrophin receptor; NTR) receptors were investigated in normal oral mucosa and in HNSCC.

entity.text: extrinsic apoptotic signaling pathway via death domain receptors

sentence.text: p75NTR in HNnegative regulation of peptidase activity might be related with extrinsic apoptotic signaling pathway via death domain receptors-independent therapy resistance, while NTRK1 might transduce a survival signal of NGF and contribute in this way to improved tumor cell survival after cell cycle arrest

entity.text: extrinsic apoptotic signaling pathway via death domain receptors
